languages.text: "Нет, элантах. Физической боли не будет — но ты сможешь увидеть боль внутреннюю, если она кровоточит в твоей душе".
"No, elantach. There is no physical pain, but you will be able to see your inner pain if it is bleeding in your soul."
languages.original_text: "Нет, элантах. Физической боли не будет — но ты сможешь увидеть боль внутреннюю, если она кровоточит в твоей душе".

traits.locale_text: "No, elantach. There's no physical pain — but you will be able to see your inner pain if it is bleeding inside your soul."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “不会的，外界人。沉浸灵魂不会带来任何躯体上的痛苦，可如果你的灵魂在流血，你将亲眼目睹自己心中的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "No, elantach. There is no physical pain, but you will be able to see your inner pain if it is bleeding in your soul."

traits.locale_text: “不会的，外界人。沉浸灵魂不会带来任何躯体上的痛苦，可如果你的灵魂在流血，你将亲眼目睹自己心中的痛苦。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No, elantach. No sentirás ningún dolor físico, pero verás tu angustia interior si se está derramando en tu alma».
languages.original_text: "No, elantach. There is no physical pain, but you will be able to see your inner pain if it is bleeding in your soul."

traits.locale_text: «No, elantach. No sentirás ningún dolor físico, pero verás tu angustia interior si se está derramando en tu alma».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Non, elantach. Vous ne ressentirez aucune douleur physique, mais vous serez en mesure de voir si des blessures intérieures affligent votre âme. »
languages.original_text: "No, elantach. There is no physical pain, but you will be able to see your inner pain if it is bleeding in your soul."

traits.locale_text: « Non, elantach. Vous ne ressentirez aucune douleur physique, mais vous serez en mesure de voir si des blessures intérieures affligent votre âme. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Nein, Elantach. Es gibt keinen körperlichen Schmerz, aber falls in Eurer Seele innere Schmerzen bluten, werdet Ihr sie sehen."
languages.original_text: "No, elantach. There is no physical pain, but you will be able to see your inner pain if it is bleeding in your soul."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Elantach. Es gibt keinen körperlichen Schmerz, aber falls in Eurer Seele innere Schmerzen bluten, werdet Ihr sie sehen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「いや、エランタ。肉体的な痛みはないが、内なる痛みが魂に滲んでいるのであれば、それを見ることができるだろう」
languages.original_text: "No, elantach. There is no physical pain, but you will be able to see your inner pain if it is bleeding in your soul."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、エランタ。肉体的な痛みはないが、内なる痛みが魂に滲んでいるのであれば、それを見ることができるだろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır elantach. Fiziksel bir acı vermeyecek ama ruhun kanıyorsa içindeki acıyı göreceksin."
languages.original_text: "No, elantach. There is no physical pain, but you will be able to see your inner pain if it is bleeding in your soul."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır elantach. Fiziksel bir acı vermeyecek ama ruhun kanıyorsa içindeki acıyı göreceksin."
